name: Good Boy!
description:
The game "Good boy" is an arcade game. Your character is the dog "good boy". The objective of the game is to get to the owner what she has lost.
A good boy will face complex obstacles: garbage cans, fire hydrants, lasers, smart missiles and much more.

Features:

- 3 difficult levels that need to go through a certain time with a limited amount of money on lives
- 3 bosses - leaders of world nuclear powers
- 5 lives and a timer
-Incredibly simple interface
-Many humor

Good luck!
